page.title: 14Girl Guides
page.content: At 7.00pm on Tuesdays I go to the Village Hall to Guides.We do all sorts of activities.In the summer we play rounders in the garden,using the trees as bases.We have a Christmas Bazaar which we make things for.We have an open-night in July,when we sell cakes,sweets and toys.We have a tuck-shop every Tuesday looked after by Mrs.Lucas,our Assistant-Guider.Our Guider is Mrs.Lawrence and our Young Leader is called Marie.We are grouped into patrols named after animals and flowers.Guides finishes at 8.30pm.We pay 20p subscription and 5p patrol funds each week.
